text: Wrexham & Shropshire (WSMR) was the operating name of the Wrexham, Shropshire and Marylebone Railway Company, a former train operating company in the United Kingdom. The company had a seven-year agreement to operate passenger train services from Wrexham via Shropshire to London. Wrexham & Shropshire began services on 28 April 2008. The service finished on 28 January 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== *Wrexham & Shropshire official website *WSMR revised track access application on the ORR website *Suzanne Roberts Train service could bring boost Shropshire Star, 8 January 2007 *Direct London train for Wrexham BBC News, 1 February 2006 *New rail link between Shropshire and London BBC Shropshire, 8 December 2006 *Laing Rail *Renaissance Trains Category:Shropshire Category:West Midlands (region) Category:Oxfordshire Category:Open-access train operating companies Category:2008 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Defunct railway companies of the United Kingdom Category:2011 disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: Wrexham & Shropshire
